aboutUsPage.title: WAKAN WEALTH
aboutUsPage.intro: A leading company providing suitable solutions for all business sectors
aboutUsPage.partnership: with the Kafalah program for SMEs
aboutUsPage.experience: We have over a hundred years of experience

aboutUsPage.summary: Wakan's team consists of consultants who have held prestigious positions in the private sector and have distinguished consulting experience.  A select base of clients have long-term relationships with them, based on professionalism and mutual trust.  Flexibility and broad horizons allow them to keep pace with local and international changes in completing work and communicating with clients.  They provide the best service by seeking to understand clients' needs and providing the best financing and investment solutions through agreements with financing agencies (banks and financing companies) that serve clients needs with easy terms and the lowest profit margins. Wakan embraces a group of experts and consultants distinguished by their specialized and accumulated experience acquired through their work in the largest international and local professional institutions.

restructuringSer.title: Restructuring and Organization
restructuringSer.description: We provide innovative solutions for financial and administrative restructuring through the following steps:

steps.assessment: Identifying the reasons that led or will lead to difficulties.
steps.completion: Completing the process professionally to achieve the desired goals.
steps.market_studies: Supervising the preparation of market and technical studies.
steps.transaction_analysis: Studying transactions comprehensively and analyzing strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and challenges.
steps.risk_assessment: Assessing the degree of risk and mitigation strategies.
steps.funding_options: Setting out available financing alternatives and expected returns for each option.

projectFinancing.title: Project Financing
projectFinancing.description: Determining Appropriate Financing Needs. Prepare the credit file. Determine available financing alternatives and their costs. Contact financial institutions, negotiate and review contracts, and terminate contracts as needed.  Obtain financing with real estate or point-of-sale guarantees for companies and institutions; the financing value is deducted from the company's or institution's income. Obtain financing on rented properties (residential and commercial buildings, factories, towers, complexes, warehouses, stations, and land); the  value financing is deducted from revenue, not the customer's income. Carry out financing with a real estate guarantee by mortgaging the property and financing from the customer's income through banks and approved financial companies.

mergersAcquisitions.title: Mergers and Acquisitions
mergersAcquisitions.description: We assist investors and decision-makers in prioritizing and meeting their needs in mergers and acquisitions through:

steps.strategy: Developing and implementing a mergers and acquisitions strategy.
steps.execution: Completing the process professionally to achieve the desired results.

feasibilityStudies.title: Feasibility Studies
feasibilityStudies.description: We ensure accuracy when preparing feasibility studies through:

steps.marketStudies: Supervising the preparation of market and technical studies.
steps.projectAnalysis: Analyzing the project from all aspects, including strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and challenges.
steps.riskAssessment: Assessing project risks and finding ways to mitigate them.
steps.financingAlternatives: Providing financing alternatives and expected returns for each option.
steps.financialIndicators: Presenting feasibility study results, financial indicators, and sensitivity analysis.
